headline: Chevron or ExxonMobil: Which Big Oil Leads the Permian Charge?
summary: CVX and XOM are aligning their Permian strategies with broader low-carbon goals but are taking slightly different paths to get there.

headline: Petrobras' Environmental Hurdles Lead to Oil Blocks Auction in Brazil
summary: PBR's long-dragged environmental hurdle compels the Brazilian oil regulator to open 172 oil blocks for bidding.

raw.headline: Petrobras' Environmental Hurdles Lead to Oil Blocks Auction in Brazil

headline: 3 Dividend Stocks Yielding Over 4% to Buy in April
summary: Many growth-focused companies don't pay dividends at all, which is why the yield on the S&P 500 (SNPINDEX: ^GSPC) has fallen to just 1.4%.  Stocks with reliable dividends and high yields can be excellent ways to collect passive income no matter what the broader market is doing.  Here's why these three fool.com contributors think Chevron (NYSE: CVX), Brookfield Renewable Partners (NYSE: BEP) (NYSE: BEPC), and MSC Industrial Direct (NYSE: MSM) are three high-yield dividend stocks to buy now.

raw.headline: 3 Dividend Stocks Yielding Over 4% to Buy in April
